title: Cup of tea (Ghosts Ahoy)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A cup of tea is an item made during the Ghosts Ahoy quest. Players pour Nettle tea into a Porcelain cup given to them by the Old Crone. She refuses to drink the tea until the player adds milk. The player uses a Bucket of milk on this item which only changes the colour of the liquid and the examine text. Once given to the Old Crone, she is able to recall some aged memories for the player.

A cup of tea is an item made during the Ghosts Ahoy quest. Players pour Nettle tea into a Porcelain cup given to them by the Old Crone. She refuses to drink the tea until the player adds milk. The player uses a Bucket of milk on this item which only changes the colour of the liquid and the examine text. Once given to the Old Crone, she is able to recall some aged memories for the player.

A '''cup of tea''' is an item made during the [[Ghosts Ahoy]] [[quest]]. Players pour [[Nettle tea]] into a [[Porcelain cup]] given to them by the [[Old Crone]]. She refuses to drink the tea until the player adds milk. The player uses a [[Bucket of milk]] on this item which only changes the colour of the liquid and the examine text. Once given to the Old Crone, she is able to recall some aged memories for the player.
